places_with_reviews.name: Marina's Motel
address: Bihar More, towards Nepal Road, Uttar Bagdogra, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: So we were looking for a place to eat before boarding the flight and just stumbled over this place.Wow ! The place has an old world charm , Excellently curated menu.....Sonny Boy was pleased with Spaghetti Carbonara while Dad enjoyed the Mutton. Added bonus was the Glenary's  outlet in the premises.

Short stay at Bagdogra or plan to visit the mountains while avoiding the morning Siliguri Traffic. This place is awesome and very well located. Superb food, too polite staffs. The choice of dinner was superb.

You have ample parking. I even got my car cleaned and washed within the parking ( you need to enquire and pay for the service at the security area )

Rooms were superb with balcony. Clean washrooms, daily newspaper, complimentary tea and coffee.

I had complimentary breakfast, it was really nice and my child enjoyed it very much.

I would definitely recommend this place

Marina's went above and beyond to cater to our needs. The rooms were well cleaned and comfortable. The food was amazing and the chef, owner, even asked how they could cook some American meals to help make us feel welcome. The hotel is well located for air travel and for visiting local tea gardens!

Rooms are clean and reasonably ok considering Bagdogra a place where you don't have much options. Interior needs urgent renovation. It is located conveniently near airport. If you don't want to enter the Siliguri town, Marina can be decent option. However, it is a bit pricey considering there are no gyms and swimming pools.

One peculiar thing is they charge double amount if you order food to your room. This policy is made to discourage eating food at room. Restaurant is present inside the hotel.

Other than the location proximity to Bagdogra airport, nothing good about this hotel. The rooms are pretty old (>45yrs) and the interiors are poor. The quality of the bed sheets and the washroom is bad and doesn't live up to 3 star facilities. The breakfast menu is worst possible and have no options, even the dinner food quality is not great. The right price for the hotel should be between 1.5-2K per night as it falls on borderline 2 star experience. Only location is saving this hotel.

places_with_reviews.name: Marigold Hotel
address: Bhuttabari, South Bagdogra, near Airport, Siliguri, Dakshin Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: Rooms are small but clean, clear. Staff behaviour was very helpful and polite. Me and my husband stayed there for a night as we had an early morning flight and this hotel is located very near to the airport. They had their own kitchen so you can order food there. The food was good also. If needed we'll prefer to stay there again in future.

This is a transit hotel so please read the review accordingly. It’s a small place in a village but really close to bagdogra airport. Absolutely inexpensive and should give 100% credit to the staff(and the owner), the service is impeccable. They have their own kitchen, will give you good food. The village just behind is quaint and nice. They have their own auto service which can take you to town. Rooms are obviously small but have all facilities required for a transit hotel. I had low expectations but really enjoyed my stay.

I stayed here for a day a pretty good hotel very near to the airport. The hospitality was really good. I arrived early so host was kind enough to help me out with spending time till my next flight. All the staff in the place were also friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this place if you want a stay near the airport.

It gets the job done. I had a hard time picking a hotel as it seems every business in India has a bunch of one star reviews. But this hotel was overall agreeable for the price. The owner and most of his staff were helpful, the location is unbeatable for access to the airport, and the bed was comfy. Honestly, if they took the time to clean the dead bugs, fingerprints, and smudges off the wall, I’d give it 5 stars for what it is. Also, just a heads up, their arranged airport drop off doesn’t take you all the way to the gate. Not their fault as it’s the airports rules but it’s a few minute walk to the entrance which isn’t bad at all but might be if it’s raining or you have a lot of luggage. Overall, I’d stay here again when passing through.
Fantastic place to stay, ita very close to airport. The owner was super kind to arrange a drop to airport. Very clean and tidy rooms. Overall 10/10. Thank you for the amazing stay

places_with_reviews.name: Orbit Hotel Bagdogra
address: Airport Plaza, Upper, More, near Bihar, Uttar Bagdogra, Bagdogra, Siliguri, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: The hotel is located in a old building with a coaching center below it, and other weird people were also nearby. The rooms are very okayish and the toilets aren't clean but okay. We ordered the food and it got prepared 1.5 hours later!!. Visit only if you have layovers at the nearby airport. It isn't recommended for family

Just 10 minutes away from Airport, Food and Service was impeccable. Rooms were spacious, if you are travelling with kids, you might want to consider this hotel. This is a ex-summit group hotel property, lack of proper maintenance and upkeeping is clearly visible though. Food was delicious, and complimentary breakfast was served by 7:20. staffs were helpful and manager was courteous .

We stayed here for a night on our way to Darjeeling.
Though the hotel was quite decent but in our room geyser, water heater nothing was working. But the staffs were really helpful mainly Mr. Ram. As the geyser was not working they asked us to use bathroom in a different room. And for food they serve at room,you just need to call the reception and tell them what you want. But overall the stay was not pleasant as the rooms were not equipped with the facilities it mentioned.

We just stayed here for a night since it is Near to airport. Decent rooms, they do have restaurant and provide breakfast as complementary. They also arrange cabs to airport which has to be paid by the guest.
Had a good experience here. The rooms were clean, service was quick, the food was deliciously homely, and the staff was very helpful.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Jagat
address: Nh 31, Airport More ,Main Road, Bagdogra, Dumriguri, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: Property is located very close to the airport . They have decent rooms, kept clean and tidy . Friendly staff and owner made sure our stay was just fine . Overall recommend the property if one is looking for a place to stay at Bagdogra.

We chose this hotel for a night stay on the way to Kalimpong, we were worried about our CAT Boy "Anjelo", as many hotels do not allow pets, to our surprise the hotel owner and all the service staff were so accommodating, and helpful starting from checkin with Anjelo till time of check out. We took 3 bed room, was big enough to make Anjelo and my daughter play around, my suggestion if you are looking for a hotel with car parking (basement has parking) and pet friendly near Bagdogra Airport, please look no further, go for Hotel Jagat. Has an in-house kitchen, for tasty indian and indo Chinese recipes. Thank you for making our stay wonderful ❤️❤️❤️❤️.
This is actually unreal. The best hotel and restaurant experience we had till NOW 💯.

Checked in just a night. Easy access to the airport if you have early flight from IXB. Budget non AC rooms are not that great considering the premium rooms. Friendly staff and owner. Infant I have visited multiple times.
Very helpful manager. Safe and secure underground car parking. Comfortable two king size double beds, enough for four adults.

places_with_reviews.name: AIRPORT LODGE
address: Vivekananda Pally, behind Merina Hotel, Uttar Bagdogra, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: Please don't choose this hotel, even though the room says ac, they will not turn it on!! Saying ac is there but it's not mentioned it'll be turned on , what a joke!!! They don't seem to understand and have basic courtesy. Also the way they talk is impolite! Stinky bedsheet , room and low quality cushions, seems like they have never replaced it!!! If you care about your skin and money, better to stay anywhere else except this place

This place is a joke!! Right beside dumpyard, might get disease because of filthiness just outside the hotel !! I would suggest people to refrain this place, please please dont visit. They dont seem to underatand anything you say, and the room is dirty, with stinky pillows and bedsheets, that seems to be never have been replaced.

The new and best hotel near bagdogra airport.
We are lucky for the sweet young man who puck up and lets us stay here .
Very neat and clean, very good staffs. Excellent service. Only problem is the approach road which is narrow and filthy.

Well furnished, neat and clean , spacious rooms with washroom equipped with modern amenities.
Staffs are very welcoming and polite. 10 mins distance from bagdogra airport. Room tariff is affordable. Cab service is also available.

places_with_reviews.name: Bagdogra Home Stay
address: Airport More, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text:
Bagdogra Homestay is suitable for budget travelers only, especially considering its proximity to Bagdogra Airport, making it the most economical option in the area. The rooms, albeit old-fashioned and lacking a cozy ambiance, served the purpose for a cost-effective stay. Location is in between the crowded market.

Unfortunately, the rooms lacked basic amenities such as a single hook for hanging clothes, and both the rooms and bathrooms were devoid of mirrors, toiletries. The absence of facilities for obtaining hot water in the bathroom was notable, although the staff exhibited exceptional service by offering a bucket of hot water from an external source. Bed sheets and blankets were not cleaned properly.

The room's storage options were limited to an open concrete structure shelf, and the absence of a dustbin was a noticeable oversight. However, it's essential to note that given the price paid for rooms near the airport, setting overly high expectations may not be necessary.

In summary, Bagdogra Homestay is a reasonable choice for those on a budget, especially due to its proximity to Bagdogra Airport. While the rooms may lack certain conveniences, the accommodating staff and affordability make it a sensible option for those looking for a cost-effective stay near the airport.
Room's are very good..you will get towel, blanket & free wifi as well .House keeping staffs not good.over all an avarage experience.

do not book here! polluted, dirty market area with litter everywhere. unsafe feeling/ vibe. closed. no elevator. I asked for a refund and had to find another place to stay thankfully with the help of a local auto driver. I asked for refund, nor resolution - they said outright NO.

It's meaningless to be defined as home stay.  The owner nicely cheating the tourists. This is in crowdy market complex. Maintenance is pathetic, unhygienic... Overall its like staying in footpath/ platform. Not worth for even single *

Location is good for airport but staff was very rude to words all the senior ladies also and demanding more extra charge for rooms , water, hot water  pathetic conditions of room and room was not cleaned and  soap is also not available  every thing we have to pay

places_with_reviews.name: Das Hotel
address: Bihar More, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text:
In our personal experience if your concern is budget go for this place, we got scammed as our driver took this place, they ended up charging 1300 rs , when this place was worth less then 1000 rs .

Got get fooled by facade of exterior and suit wearing receptionist..the rooms are standard of lodge then hotel...no phone connection..and biggest scam don't try to order food from room service ...they get you cheap Chinese food and charge exorbitant price for really bad tasting food.

PS: If you are looking for room to stay over in Bagdogra.highly recommend you to search for other hotel instead of this...you can get better quality stay and food in other hotels
It's awesome, the stay in this hotel is unforgettable, staff are so polite and humble,, rooms are very clean, I wish my every friend come and enjoy the hospitality of this hotel,,
I would not recommend this hotel to anyone in normal circumstances. However, if you want to stay in a nearby hotel to Bagdogra Airport then you can choose this one. Otherwise, not cost worthy.
The hotel is in good market place but just ok to spend a night and catch the train the next morning.
WiFi connection is very slow. 3 bed non AC 1500 which is very high compare to quality. Bed cover is not clean. Not recommend

places_with_reviews.name: Kundu Hotel - Hotel in Bagdogra
address: Bihar more, Bagdogra, Dist.- Darjeeling, West Bengal, Pin- 734014, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: Stayed here 1 night to catch a flight on the next morning. Good service. Clean hotel rooms. Airport here 7 min distance in car. Hotel authority can arrange the car in the early morning.
Bathroom is fully wet as shower is leaking. Rooms are smelly. No water, tea/coffee available in room. And prices are too high in comparison to facilities.
I stayed on 31st October 23 for one night.. I stayed Room No.205 it was okay type.. Location Bihar More ,5-10 minutes from Bagdogra airport . They have their own Restaurant.
Good to stay one night but the food quality is not satisfactory
The restaurant serves good quality food. Try to avoid fish thali. Service is excellent

places_with_reviews.name: Collection O Relax Hotel
address: Unnamed Road, Bagdogra, Siliguri, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text: Horrible service. The owner cancelled my booking from oyo which was prepaid. I lost my money and he has no empathy that we are stuck in a new city. Very greedy person that won't take booking from his preferred channel. Please avoid this fraud at any cost
The owner of the hotel was very helpful and caring person (a rare trait in current Times) ...

My stay at this hotel was absolutely fantastic! The hotel's ambiance was delightful, and the room was both comfortable and elegant. The staff's hospitality was exceptional, and one particular staff member, Tarun, made my experience truly unforgettable. His attention to detail and genuine care for guests set the standard for outstanding service. I can't wait to return to this gem of a hotel!
The colours seem more vibrant for rooms in which we prefer to rest.

Apart from very well maintained hotel rooms, the owner of the hotel  is a very warm and helpful human being. It appears that a lot of thought has been given while providing amenities in the hotel rooms. I would recommend 10/10 times a person desiring to stay near Bagdogra airport should stay at this hotel. The owner also arranged cabs for outstation / local sight-seeing at very reasonable rates, cheaper than what other operators were asking.

places_with_reviews.name: Mayer Anchal
address: MAYER ANCHAL BUILDING, AH3 College More, Bagdogra, Rupsing, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text:
nice and cleanest hotel around this area in bagdogra. also at resonalable price.
allowed me to do late check out as my flight was delayed.

New hotel with very big glass windows from floor to roof in front side of highway...hills can be viewed...good scenic beauty.The behaviour of the staff is very cordial with valuable assistance.The restaurant facility is not there.However the food is arranged by staff and is available from nearby restaurant.Ths room has a facility of hot water,AC,smart TV etc.It is located very close to Bagdogra Airport .

Very unhygienic..they didn't clean the room since the last person..washroom was so dirty felt like vomiting...when I asked if it can be cleaned he said no it can't be as it is evening now...this is not a hotel..it's like lodge .
Newly constructed not very good only okay if you need a place to crash at night and you have a flight to catch in the morning.

It's a very good hotel beside the National Highway.
People's are very friendly.
